query.value:
select * from CompSuite__Document_Header__c
WHERE LastModifiedDate >= '@{activity('get watermark').output.firstRow.highValue}'

body.value:
[[
{
"Timestamp" :"@{utcnow()}",
"Factory Name" :"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
"Pipeline Name" :"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
"Pipeline Run Id" :"@{pipeline().RunId}",
"Activity Name" :"Mrr_SF_Master_Document - Merge",
"Merge Activity - Insert" :@{if(
contains(activity('upsert').output,'firstRow'),
activity('upsert').output.firstRow.INSERT,
0)},
"Merge Activity - Update" :@{if(
contains(activity('upsert').output,'firstRow'),
activity('upsert').output.firstRow.UPDATE,
0)}
}
]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [SupplierName]
      ,[Supplier Number]
      ,[SupplierType]
      ,[Location]
      ,[EAN #]
      ,[AuditPerfom]
      ,case when [ActualAuditDate] like '%Not done moved%' then null else [ActualAuditDate] end as [ActualAuditDate]
      ,[AuditDurationDays]
      ,[LeadAuditorName]
      ,case when [Audit Team] = 'NA' then null else [Audit Team] end as [Audit Team]
      ,[AuditType]
      ,case when [Findings_Critical]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Critical] end as [Findings_Critical]
      ,case when [Findings_Major]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Major] end as [Findings_Major]
      ,case when [Findings_Moderate]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Moderate] end as [Findings_Moderate]
      ,case when [Findings_Observ]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Observ] end as [Findings_Observ]
      ,case when [AuditResults] = 'NA' then null else [AuditResults] end as [AuditResults]
      ,case when [AuditorScore] = 'NA' then null else [AuditorScore] end as [AuditorScore]
  FROM [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Calc_Suppliers_Audit_Activities_Followup]

select 
 cast(c.id as nvarchar) as U_PortalID
,c.fSerialNumber
,c.callID
,c.status
,c.dtCreatedDate 
,c.Subject
,c.closeDate
,c.itemName
,c.itemCode
,c.Customer
,c.custmrName
,c.callType
,c.ComplaintSource
,s.servicedate
,s.dtcheckoutdate
,cast(s.status as nvarchar) serviceStatus
,s.fcreatedbyid
,s.UserServiceCenterSAPID
from srv.Mrr_Complaint C
left join srv.Mrr_Service   S on C.fServiceID = S.ID

union all

select 
 U_PortalID
,internalSN
,callid
,status
,U_CompDate
,subject
,closeDate
,itemName
,itemCode
,customer
,custmrName
,callType
,NULL as ComplaintSource
,U_ServiceDate
,U_dtcheckoutdate
,U_ServiceStatus
,cast(userSign as int) userSign
,U_UserServiceCenter
from sap.Mrr_OSCL

select 
 ordr.DocEntry
,ordr.DocNum
,ordr.canceled
,ordr.DocStatus
,ordr.DocDate
,ordr.CardCode
,ordr.CardName
,ordr.U_OrderType
,rdr1.LineNum
,rdr1.LineStatus
,rdr1.ItemCode
,rdr1.ShipDate
,rdr1.SerialNum
,spac.Status
,sser.LineId
,sser.U_SerialNo
from sap.Mrr_ORDR_replica ordr
join sap.Mrr_RDR1_replica rdr1 on ordr.DocEntry = rdr1.DocEntry
join sap.Mrr_Srv_Packing  spac on cast(ordr.docnum as nvarchar) = spac.u_so
join sap.Mrr_Srv_Serials  sser on sser.DocEntry = spac.DocEntry

select
YEAR([End date (end of IQC)]) Year
,DATEPART(week,[End date (end of IQC)]) WeeK
,cast([Date of receipt] as date) DateReciept
,cast([End date (end of IQC)] as date) EndDateIQC
,[MRB #] as Itemcode
,[Product belongs to] ProductType
,[Supplier Cod] SupplierID
,[Supplier] as SupplierName
--,[Lot Source_Supplier /_Q Core] as SourceLot
,[Total Qty. Received] TotalRecQty
,[Sample Size] as SampleSize
,Case when [Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)]='PAss'		 then '1'
	  when [Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)]='Fail'		 then '0'
	  when ISNULL([Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)],'')='' then Null end  as 'Pass/Fail',
[Batch #] [Batch Number],
[Rev number ]
 from [ScoreCards].[Mrr_IQC_Followup]
 where YEAR([End date (end of IQC)])>='2015' 
 and supplier<>'In house'
 and ([Total Qty. Received] not LIKE '%+%'
 and  [Total Qty. Received]  not LIKE '%(%')

select YEAR(ScarSendingDate) as 'Year', DATEPART(WEEK,ScarSendingDate) as 'Week' , SupplierName,SupplierNo,PartDescription,PN,MRBNo,Descriptionofdeviation,ScarSendingDate,
AllowedReturnDate,ReminderDate,ScarReturningDate

 from ScoreCards.Mrr_ScarLog
 where YEAR(ScarSendingDate)>='2016'

select YEAR(ActualAuditDate) as 'Year',DATEPART(WEEK,ActualAuditDate) as 'Week', *
 from [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Suppliers_Audit_Activities_Followup]
 where SupplierName<>'Supplier Name'
